info.title: Isla Control Center API
info.description: APIs to perform administrative, session management, reporting, etc. tasks.

parameters.name: includeRefreshToken
parameters.description: flag to include or exclude refresh token in response

post.description: Authenticates and generates JWT token requried for invoking below APIs. Please copy the 'token' from the response and add it to the 'Authorize' input section above. This will be required for trying out other APIs listed below.

identityProvider.description: Identity provider to validate the user credential

licenseStatus.description: Provides license status whether it is active or expired. The license status needs to be in 'active' state to access protected API's

refreshToken.description: It can be used as a login method instead of username/password

token.description: JWT Token which is used to access protected API's

TenantSettings.description:
Below are different tenant settings with code and description
1. browser.http_proxy: HTTP Proxy URL
2. browser.https_proxy: HTTPS Proxy URL
3. browser.no_proxy: Should contain a comma-separated list of domain extensions proxy
4. category_check: Technique to be used for determining category
5. email.smtp.admin_portal_base_url: Organization base URL
6. email.smtp.adminemail: The email address you would like to send admin notification(s)
7. email.smtp.auth: Set to true to enable authentication. Required for user/authentication based SMTP setups
8. email.smtp.debug: Debugging output will appear in Isla Application Server logs only when the server attempts to send notifications
9. email.smtp.encryption: Type of encryption to be used
10. email.smtp.from: Email address
11. email.smtp.host: SMTP server hostname
12. email.smtp.password: SMTP password
13. email.smtp.port: Port
14. email.smtp.timeout: Mailer timeout
15. email.smtp.username: SMTP username
16. isla_proxy_host: Isla Proxy Host
17. isla_proxy_port: Isla Proxy Port
18. maldun_api_baseurl: Maldun APIs base URL
19. maldun_api_key: Maldun API Key
20. maldun_report_maxretry: Max number of re-tries for getting file status
21. maldun_report_retryinterval: Interval in seconds between each re-try
22. maldun_score_threshold: Maldun score threshold 1-10
23. notification.methods: Set to Email to receive email alerts about important system or user
24. notification.new_user_email: When enabled new internally authenticated users will receive an email notifying them regarding their new account
25. policy_handling: Defines how policies are handled if more than two policies have conflicts

default.description: The default value is used in case no value is provided by tenant admin

description.description: Describes what the code means and/or what operation can be performed

displayName.description: Label being showed to tenant admin

displaySequence.description: Position in the page it needs to be shown

groupName.description: The group that item belongs to

hidden.description: Indicates whether the field needs to be shown/hidden at user interface

required.description: Indicates whether the field is compulsory to be filled or it takes the default value if provided

example.default: File upload failed. Please retry. Contact administrator if error persists.
example.description: File upload failed due to system error

example.default: File upload failed. Please retry. Contact administrator if error persists.
example.description: File upload failed due to system error

value.description: Custom message that replaces default message

messages.BROWSE_CERTIFICATE_WARNING: Could not verify certificate. Do you want to continue?
messages.CLIPBOARD_DISABLED: Clipboard restricted by policy. Contact administrator for more information.
messages.DOWNLOAD_DISABLED: File downloads restricted by policy. Contact administrator for more information.
messages.DOWNLOAD_FAIL: File download failed. Please retry. Contact administrator if error persists.
messages.DOWNLOAD_POLICY_FAIL: File cannot be downloaded as it violates download policy
messages.DOWNLOAD_READY: File {$1} is ready to download. Click 'DOWNLOAD' to save file.
messages.DOWNLOAD_REJECTED: File {$2} rejected due to potential malicious content ({$1}). Please contact administrator for more information.
messages.DOWNLOAD_REQUEST: File {$1} has been submitted for download. It may take some time. Download might be impacted if you navigate away from this page.
messages.DOWNLOAD_SIZE_DISALLOWED: File size exceeds policy limits. Contact administrator for more information.
messages.DOWNLOAD_STARTED_WITH_NOSCAN: Download initiated by the user when no scan before download policy is applied.
messages.ISOLATION_ERROR: Unknown error occurred. Please retry. Contact administrator if error persists.
messages.ISOLATION_NODE_CONNECTION_ERROR: Error connecting to the isolation node. Please retry. Contact administrator if error persists.
messages.ISOLATION_NODE_CONNECTION_WARNING: Unable to connect to isolation node. Retrying connection.
messages.ISOLATION_NODE_UNAVAILABLE: No isolation nodes available at this time. Please retry. Contact administrator if error persists.
messages.NEW_BROWSING_DEVICE: New browsing session started for user {$1} on browser {$2} on machine {$3} / {$4}
messages.PAGE_BLOCKED:
This URL {url} has been blocked by administrative policy.
For additional information, Please contact your Administrator.
messages.PAGE_READONLY: Page rendered as read-only due to suspected risk. Proceed at your own risk.
messages.PAGE_WARN_READONLY: Page rendered as read-only due to suspected risk.
messages.PRINT_DISABLED: Print restricted by policy. Contact administrator for more information.
messages.PRINT_FAIL: Print failed. Please retry. Contact administrator if error persists.
messages.PRINT_READY: Ready to print. Click 'PRINT' to proceed.
messages.PRINT_REQUEST: Processing Print. You will be notified when ready.
messages.PRINT_SIZE_DISALLOWED: Print size exceeds policy limits. Contact administrator for more information.
messages.SAFE_PREVIEW_CANCELED: User canceled safe preview mode of displayed file.
messages.SAFE_PREVIEW_STARTED: File is displayed to the user in safe preview mode.
messages.TENANT_UNKNOWN: Invalid domain or organization. Please contact administrator.
messages.TERMINATE_MIGRATE: Browsing session terminated since user logged in from another device or browser. Contact administrator if this is in error.
messages.TERMINATE_RECYLE: Remote browsing session was terminated by administrator. Please retry.
messages.TERMINATE_UNKNOWN: Browsing session unexpectedly terminated. Please retry. Contact administrator if error persists.
messages.UPLOAD: Browse your computer to select file.
messages.UPLOAD_DISABLED: File uploads restricted by policy. Contact administrator for more information.
messages.UPLOAD_FAIL: File upload failed. Please retry. Contact administrator if error persists.
messages.UPLOAD_SIZE_DISALLOWED: File size exceeds policy limits. Contact administrator for more information.

idpSignAuthorizationRequests.description: To sign the authorization certificate. Required as true for most SAML identity providers

baseDN.description: Proper base for the Active Directory where Isla start searching directory structure. Example- dc=example,dc=com

bindDN.description: Username that will be used to do searching and request the authentication

bindPassword.description: Password used by the LDAP user specified in the Bind DN

certificate.description: Administrators must provide the appropriate certificate (allowed formarts .crt, .pem)

connectionURL.description: Connection URL to your LDAP server. Example- ldap://domain.pnq.aps:3392 or ldaps://domain.pnq.aps

groupBaseDN.description: Starting point to look for group. Example- cn=groups,dc=example,dc=com

groupFilter.description: Bring the groups that match the filter

groupFixedIDAttr.description: Assign a fixed group ID attribute to minimize the possibility of accidentally introducing dual account for a group

groupNameAttr.description: The attribute holding the name of a group

serverConnectionTimeout.description: The duration in seconds that Isla waits before considering the AD server is unreachable

startTLS.description: Click to enable/disable LDAP over SSL/TLS. Administrators must install the appropriate certificate

syncInterval.description: Time to wait between directory updates. Minimum is 1 hour

userBaseDN.description: Starting point to look for user. Example- cn=users,dc=example,dc=com

userDisplayNameAttr.description: The user attribute whose value is a display name

userEmailAttr.description: The user attribute whose value is an email address

userFilter.description: Bring in the users that match the filter. This can be used to limit the number users with access to Isla

userFixedIDAttr.description: Assign a fixed user ID attribute to minimize the possibility of accidentally introducing dual account for a user

userGroupMemberAttr.description: The attribute containing the group that a user is a member of

userUsernameAttr.description: The attribute whose value matches the username part of the credential entered by the users when logging in to Isla

IdentityProviderCheckConnectionPostReque.description: Request body for identity provider check connection

bindDN.description: Username that will be used to do searching and request the authentication

bindPassword.description: Password used by the LDAP user specified in the Bind DN

certificate.description: Administrators must provide the appropriate certificate (allowed formarts .crt, .pem)

connectionURL.description: Connection URL to your LDAP server. Example- ldap://domain.pnq.aps:3392 or ldaps://domain.pnq.aps

serverConnectionTimeout.description: The duration in seconds that Isla waits before considering the AD server is unreachable

startTLS.description: Click to enable/disable LDAP over SSL/TLS. Administrators must install the appropriate certificate

syncInterval.description: Time to wait between directory updates. Minimum is 1 hour

ResourceValidationError.description: Error information. Note all the errors are in the form of Keys

ValidationError.description: Error information. Note all the errors are in the form of Keys
